title: Dorit Kemsley flashes her cleavage in black sparkly suit at Gladys Knight's 75th birthday bash
text:
They put their money worries aside to party at Gladys Knight's 75th birthday bash on Sunday.

Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills star Dorit Kemsley and husband PK were among the slew of celebrities who turned up at Herb Alpert's Vibrato Grill Jazz in Los Angeles for the fun event.

The 43-year-old blonde dressed to thrill in a sparkly black jacket and matching skinny pants encrusted with sequins.

Party time: Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills star Dorit Kemsley and husband PK were among celebrities at Gladys Knight's 75th birthday bash on Sunday

She left the jacket unbuttoned to her navel to give a glimpse of her cleavage, encased in a sheer black top.

The star smoothed her blonde hair back into a long pony tail and she accessorized with a small silver purse.

PK, 53, whose actual name is Paul, rocked a black jacket and pants with a slight sheen plus a black polo shirt and, strangely, white sneakers.

Birthday girl Gladys, who cut her first single in 1962, performed for her guests at the bash, which comes six moths after her actual birthday, May 28.

Time to celebrate: Dorit, 43, and PK, 53, were among the slew of celebrities who turned up at Herb Alpert's Vibrato Grill Jazz in Hollywood for the fun event

Others at the event included music producer Foster, 69, and American Idol alum McPhee, 35; Michael Jackson's sister LaToya, 63; LaLa Hathaway, 50; actress Keesha Sharp, 46; football star turned actor Terry Crews, 51, and wife Rebecca, 53.

They were joined by Tommy Chong, 81, and wife Shelby, 71; comedienne Loni Love, 48; singer and actress V. Bozeman plus Bradford Sharp and wife Keesha as well as movie producer Leah Sydney.

Meanwhile, Dorit and PK are navigating money problems. They have been hit with federal liens worth nearly $1million in back taxes over the course of three years.

Dressed to thrill: Dorit showed off her cleavage in a sparkly black jacket buttoned at her navel and matching skinny pants encrusted with sequins as she carried a silver purse

This comes after the couple recently settled a $1.2million court battle after a former business partner accused them of not paying up on a loan.

And they are struggling to sell their Beverly Hills mansion despite more than $5million in price cuts over the course of two years.

The couple initially listed the property in the trendy 90210 zipcode for $12.75million in 2017 after buying it for $6.5million the previous year.

They recently settled on a $7.5million price tag, with at least seven price cuts in between.

description: The couple, who recently joined the Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills, were among a slew of celebrities at the starry event at Herb Alpert's Vibrato Grill Jazz in Hollywood on Sunday./
